channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report X-2025010638
item.description:
Report X-2025010638

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-10
  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED ABOUT A LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD. UPPON ARRIVAL THEY FOUND A HAMAT PACKAGE WITH 4.1 DIAMON HAZARD LABEL LEAKING ON THE FLOOR OF THE UNLOAD TRAILER. PACKAGE WAS CLEANED UP AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROCESSING. FURTHER INSPECTION FOUND 4 1GAL CONTAINERS, 1 WAS DENTED AND LEAKING FROM THE SEAM.
